title: Alone with You  Tevin Campbell song
content: Alone with You (Tevin Campbell song)  "Alone With You" is a song by American singer Tevin Campbell. The hit song is Tevin's sixth single off his debut album "T.E.V.I.N." and second to reach number one on the R&B charts where it stayed for one week. The song didn't chart as well on the "Billboard" Hot 100 peaking at #72.  US Promo CD
